properties.areaDesc: Richland, SC; Calhoun, SC; Lexington, SC
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 9 at 9:15PM EST by NWS Columbia SC
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South
Carolina...

Pee Dee River At Cheraw affecting Chesterfield and Marlboro Counties

Wateree River At Lake Wateree affecting Fairfield...Kershaw and
Lancaster Counties

Wateree River Near Camden affecting Kershaw County

Saluda River At Chappells affecting Greenwood...Newberry and Saluda
Counties

Congaree River At Columbia affecting Lexington and Richland Counties

Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Calhoun...Lexington
and Richland Counties

Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Calhoun
and Richland Counties

North Fork Edisto River At Orangeburg affecting Orangeburg County

...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Savannah River at Augusta affecting Richmond and Aiken Counties

.Elevated flows from upstream continue to affect most area rivers
following the significant rain event last Thursday.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Congaree River At Carolina Eastman.
* until further notice...Or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  7 PM Sunday the stage was 126.1 feet.
* Flood stage is 115.0 feet.
* Major flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river crested at 126.4 feet and will continue to fall
to around a stage of 124 feet by late morning Monday.
* At 127.0 feet...Portions of the Carolina Eastman facility have to be
evacuated.
* At 126.0 feet...Extensive farmland and lowland flooding will occur
south of Columbia to Lake Marion. Water reaches the top of some
dikes at the Carolina Eastman Facility.
* At 124.0 feet...Extensive flooding occurs at the Carolina Eastman
Facility with some access roads flooded. Extensive farmland
flooding occurs in the area.
* At 119.0 feet...Extensive flooding occurs in the Congaree National
Park. Some area farmland is flooded. Minor flooding occurs at the
Carolina Eastman Facility.
* At 115.0 feet...Flooding occurs in low lying areas of the Carolina
Eastman Facility and at the Congaree National Park.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The
water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to
play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to noaa weather radio...
local media or the internet for further statements and updated
forecasts.
